Forest_Objective_01.Name: Find the House, Kill the Occupant
Forest_Objective_01.Description: Reach the house outside the nearby waterfall. Enter the house. Kill the sleeping occupant.

Forest_Objective_02.Name: Reach the Shore
Forest_Objective_02.Description: Head towards the ocean. Intel suggests enemy can be found in the area.

Forest_Objective_02b.Name: Steal the Cave Artifact
Forest_Objective_02b.Description: Find and steal the artifact inside the Cave.

Forest_Objective_03.Name: Stop the Boat
Forest_Objective_03.Description: Kill the enemy character by destroying his boat as he loops around the shore area.
